salaryExpectations: LKR 60,000 (Govt./Pvt. School) to LKR 300,000+ (Principal/International School Senior Teacher) per month.
futureOutlook: There is a constant demand for qualified teachers, especially for subjects like English, Maths, and Science in the English medium. The private and international school sector offers higher salaries and is expanding rapidly. Teachers who can effectively integrate technology into their lessons (EdTech) will have a significant advantage.
